abstract: Former Guantanamo Bay prisoner Hajji Ghalib is leading effective fight against Taliban and Islamic State in Afghanistan; Ghalib claims he was wrongfully imprisoned for four years, but chose to fight on behalf of American-backed government anyway; says he has long fought Taliban, which has killed 19 of his family members, and is now also at war with Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Officials describe Hajji Ghalib as a fiercely effective fighter against the insurgency, and the American military supports his men with airstrikes.

headline.main: Once in Guantánamo, Afghan Now Leads War Against Taliban and ISIS
headline.print_headline: Freed From Guantánamo, He Fights the Taliban
